overall.description:
Returns a boolean array where two arrays are element-wise equal within a
tolerance.

equal_nan.description: Whether to compare NaN’s as equal.  If True, NaN’s in a will be considered equal to NaN’s in b in the output array.

y.description: Returns a boolean array of where a and b are equal within the given tolerance. If both a and b are scalars, returns a single boolean value.
